name: Spiny
desc: A Spiny. It doesn't stay on ledges, and hurts Mario when jumped on (unless he is spin-jumping).

name: Falling Spiny
desc: A Spiny that falls, and turns into a regular Spiny when it hits the ground.

name: Buzzy Beetle
desc: A Buzzy Beetle. It hides in its shell when jumped on for a period of time, then pops back out.

name: Upside-down Buzzy Beetle
desc: A Buzzy Beetle that walks on ceilings. It will try to fall on Mario if he gets close. It doesn't interact properly with upside-down slopes, so avoid those.

name: ...Spiny
desc: A Spiny that walks on ceilings. It will try to fall on Mario if he gets close. It doesn't interact properly with upside-down slopes, so avoid those.

name: Spike (Dynamic)
desc: A Spike from Yoshi's Island. It slowly wanders towards the player, and throws large spike balls towards Mario if it sees him.
